# NIST 800-53v5 - IA-7 - Cryptographic Module Authentication
## Guidance
Authentication mechanisms may be required within a cryptographic module to authenticate an operator accessing the module and to verify that the operator is authorized to assume the requested role and perform services within that role.
## Mapped SCF controls
- [CRY-02 - Cryptographic Module Authentication](cry-02-cryptographicmoduleauthentication.md)
- [IAC-12 - Cryptographic Module Authentication](iac-12-cryptographicmoduleauthentication.md)
